mapper.sql: custno, loginpwd, salt, nickname, status, level, idtype, idcode, idname, email, mobile, regdate, lastlogindate, lastlogintime
mapper.insert: insert into cust_info (custno, loginpwd, salt, nickname, status, level, idtype, idcode, idname, email, mobile, regdate, lastlogindate, lastlogintime) values (#{custno, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{loginpwd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idtype, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regdate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastlogindate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastlogintime, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert all
into cust_info (custno, loginpwd, salt, nickname, status, level, idtype, idcode, idname, email, mobile, regdate, lastlogindate, lastlogintime) values (#{item.custno, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.loginpwd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.salt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.nickname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.level, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.idtype, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.idcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.idname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.regdate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.lastlogindate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.lastlogintime, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
select 1 from dual
mapper.delete: delete from cust_info where 1=1 and custno = #{0}
mapper.update: update cust_info set loginpwd = #{loginpwd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salt = #{salt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{level, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idtype = #{idtype, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idcode = #{idcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idname = #{idname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, regdate = #{regdate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lastlogindate = #{lastlogindate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lastlogintime = #{lastlogintime, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where 1=1 and custno = #{custno, jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update cust_info
loginpwd = #{loginpwd, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
salt = #{salt, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nickname = #{nickname, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
level = #{level, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
idtype = #{idtype, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
idcode = #{idcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
idname = #{idname, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
regdate = #{regdate, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lastlogindate = #{lastlogindate, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lastlogintime = #{lastlogintime, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where 1=1 and custno = #{custno, jdbcType=DECIMAL}
